title: Bad block #446189 ... gas used error... Synchronisation failed: peer is unknown or unhealthy
body:
Using geth v0.9.25 (f5ce848cfe) on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

Still unable to fully download blockchain and sync with peers since time of fork.  Stalls with download and gives bad block message.  Log below:

00:17:03.960978   12789 backend.go:256] Protocol Version: 60, Network Id: 0
I0527 00:17:03.961088   12789 backend.go:266] Blockchain DB Version: 3
I0527 00:17:03.962667   12789 chain_manager.go:257] Last block (#448512) b1736aa69cf3351f23b3ad5498f4ef5cb5029e7e31e17ba30f9b5082c1fed6a5 TD=940678707671302
I0527 00:17:04.783980   12789 cmd.go:137] Starting Geth/v0.9.25-f5ce848c/linux/go1.4.2
I0527 00:17:04.784245   12789 server.go:293] Starting Server
I0527 00:17:05.897558   12789 nat.go:95] mapped network port udp:30303 -> 30303 (ethereum discovery) using UPNP IGDv1-IP1
I0527 00:17:06.027014   12789 udp.go:189] Listening, enode://304de4f120325128ef8b2f1b440d0bd49c2597fd2c3065d0d3e6cb99173d717319e5cafdcc25256e80b7942f50ba3503e8a2887b30308f9ade80c8924f59b227@24.90.50.88:30303
I0527 00:17:06.027157   12789 backend.go:477] Server started
I0527 00:17:06.027223   12789 server.go:530] Listening on [::]:30303
I0527 00:17:06.095165   12789 nat.go:95] mapped network port tcp:30303 -> 30303 (ethereum p2p) using UPNP IGDv1-IP1
I0527 00:17:17.649885   12789 downloader.go:159] Block synchronisation started
I0527 00:17:30.052353   12789 worker.go:403] transaction(265f34bf) below gas price (tx=10 Shannon ask=10 Szabo). All sequential txs from this address(a8da6124) will be ignored
I0527 00:17:30.053012   12789 worker.go:403] transaction(94f43363) below gas price (tx=10 Shannon ask=10 Szabo). All sequential txs from this address(a8da6124) will be ignored
I0527 00:17:31.595356   12789 chain_manager.go:753] Bad block #446189 (38f5bbbffd74804820ffa4bab0cd540e9de229725afb98c1a7e57936f4a714bc)
I0527 00:17:31.595534   12789 chain_manager.go:754] gas used error (44532 / 160116)
I0527 00:17:53.113002   12789 chain_manager.go:753] Bad block #446189 (38f5bbbffd74804820ffa4bab0cd540e9de229725afb98c1a7e57936f4a714bc)
I0527 00:17:53.113062   12789 chain_manager.go:754] gas used error (44532 / 160116)
I0527 00:17:53.151068   12789 sync.go:121] Synchronisation failed: no peers available or all peers tried for block download process
I0527 00:19:41.509636   12789 sync.go:121] Synchronisation failed: peer is unknown or unhealthy
I0527 00:21:38.841704   12789 sync.go:121] Synchronisation failed: peer is unknown or unhealthy
I0527 00:22:08.841435   12789 downloader.go:141] Unregister failed: peer is not registered
I0527 00:22:08.841498   12789 handler.go:102] Removal failed: peer is not registered
I0527 00:22:57.335557   12789 downloader.go:141] Unregister failed: peer is not registered
I0527 00:22:57.335663   12789 handler.go:102] Removal failed: peer is not registered
I0527 00:25:35.545802   12789 chain_manager.go:753] Bad block #446189 (38f5bbbffd74804820ffa4bab0cd540e9de229725afb98c1a7e57936f4a714bc)
I0527 00:25:35.545844   12789 chain_manager.go:754] gas used error (44532 / 160116)
I0527 00:25:35.654951   12789 sync.go:121] Synchronisation failed: block downloading cancelled (requested)

Although you should eventually be able to sync up, it could happen that you managed to connect to a lot of bad peers and those keep on going. I'm working on a fix to really drop bad peers, not just ignore them. IMHO that should solve this issue or at least significantly reduce the probability of this happening. Will ping you when it's ready.

I wonder if this is related to the latest p2p dialer?

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/1014

Seems like the network doesn't have consensus on the longest chain because at some point it stops downloading.

This should be fixed in the latest release. There was a disconnect bug that caused it, but we also had to implement some faster peer-dropping policy as there were so many bad peers in the network that those kept shadowing the valid ones. If this still persist by all means reopen, but it shouldn't :)

Same issue after 1,5 years:
E1016 10:13:25.094169 core/blockchain.go:1170] Bad block #2446183 (0x7a7499dd032df75ab05b942f1b460caa4282121decb2c1e6816668a395ca5b14)
E1016 10:13:25.094222 core/blockchain.go:1171]     gas used error (487080 / 486440)

Geth version is 1.14.18. Blockchain resync started with new release yesterday.

> Geth version is 1.14.18. Blockchain resync started with new release yesterday.

Can reproduce this issue. @karalabe is it possible this was introduced with the EIP 150 fork pull request?
